entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-24
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • when i install dotnet 8 preview maui dotnet 6 disappear #31296
  • I can't seem to install .net sdk on my Ubuntu 22.04 environment #31444
  • GenAPI produces invalid source code for record properties #31024

Updated

  • "dotnet pack" does not build #12160
    Discussion
  • [Bug]: Microsoft.NET.Sdk.targets(176,5): error MSB4018: The "GenerateDepsFile" task failed unexpectedly. #30755
  • dotnet publish multiple -r options #6490
    Backlog
  • Method '[MSBuild]::GetTargetFrameworkIdentifier' not found #14106
  • dotnet watch run --no-hot-reload stops watching for file changes #30140
  • dotnet publish is slow #10182
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for new output path format #31454
    untriaged
  • Containers: added e2e containers tests for console app #31450
    untriaged
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Insert vstest 17.6 GA version #31447
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • [Blazor] Enable custom icu loading #31446
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #31442
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable containers publishing #31432
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • bump version of the SDK container support to the latest release #31410
    untriaged
  • Code optimization in containers tests #31443
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Backport] Blazor configuration for StartupMemoryCache and Jiterpreter for 8.0 Preview 3 #31435
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Move dotnet/sdk-container-builds to dotnet/sdk #31302
  • Blazor configuration for StartupMemoryCache and Jiterpreter #31174
    Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2143550 #31394
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Adding locked messages as there is overlocalization in at least 5 of … #31421
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix `dotnet list package` when current directory contains a `#` character in Unix systems #20449
    Area-NuGet
